about.output:
I am Samrudh aka Vollhard,what have I do so far? 
1. Represented my country and competed against for developing greentech (Red Bull Basement 2021)
2. Worked with fortune 500 and unicorn companies in securing their network. 
3. Was the Head of Student R&D division of my univeristy, we built robots and satelite prototypes. 
4. Won 2 national championships with the go-kart our team built. 
 
Leaving a digital footprint of my 2cents on Tech, Design & Philosophy
